title: Waiting Alone (Du Zi Deng Dai) - 2005 - English subtitles
description:
CHINESE INDIE-HIT WAITING ALONE (DU ZI DENG DAI)

Starring: Xia Yu, Li Bingbing, Gong Beibi
Cameos: Chow Yun-Fat, David Wu, Ying Da, etc. 
Written & Directed by: Dayyan Eng

SYNOPSIS:
Set in modern day Bejing, Waiting Alone is a coming-of-age story of Wen, an antique shop owner and aspiring author who has just met the girl of his dreams. Waiting Alone shows us a China rarely seen in cinema, a China that is contemporary, hip and vibrant. (from imdb)

Excellent reviews and strong word-of-mouth made this independent film a big hit in China where it was embraced by young audiences. In 2005, Waiting Alone was nominated for three Chinese academy awards (Golden Rooster Awards) including Best Picture; the first time a nomination was awarded to a foreign director in this category. (from Wikipedia)
